mapper.select: SELECT MBSP_ID, MBSP_NAME, MBSP_EMAIL, MBSP_PASSWORD, MBSP_ZIPCODE, MBSP_ADDR, MBSP_DEADDR, MBSP_PHONE, MBSP_POINT, MBSP_LASTLOGIN, MBSP_DATESUB, MBSP_UPDATEDATE FROM MBSP_TBL WHERE MBSP_ID = #{mbsp_id}
